title: Greek type question 2
content:
**Hello,**

as promised in 'Greek type question 1' I return, this time with two slightly different versions of ναρκόω.  
In the example shown You'll see my type – Orla – in regular first, then _GFS Olga_ and _Gentium_ in grey. Below them are Orla italic with my attempts at an italic greek version.

Please share Your opinions and show no mercy.

Thanks,

ƒ

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417082858im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Orla_grek_5283.png)
author: fredo
